page_analysis.text_content:
Primary daylight plane (rear)

Fig 23 Side elevation showing Rear primary daylight plane

7.5' max. each protrusion  5' min. separation  7.5' max. each protrusion

Note: There is no front daylight plane.

* Max building height is:
• 30' for structures w/ roof slope < 12:12
• 33' for structures w/ roof slope > 12:12
• 17' for structures on substandard or flag lots regardless of flood plane
• variable for structures located in flood zones except on substandard and flag lots - up to 33'

* Cumulative length of protrusions must not exceed 15' on any one side.
Rear protrusions subject to same rules as side protrusions

Notes:
• Side daylight plane is measured (up) at lot line.
• Rear daylight plane is measured (up) at rear setback.

visual_elements.description: Side elevation drawing of a house showing the rear primary daylight plane with various dimensional annotations. The drawing includes two dormer protrusions on the roof, each with a maximum protrusion of 7.5 feet and a minimum separation of 5 feet between them. Vertical measurements indicate a 24-foot maximum for protrusions and a 16-foot height dimension. The maximum building height is marked with a dashed line extending above the roof. The drawing also shows setback and rear lot line positions with arrows and labels. Angle of 60 degrees is indicated at the roof slope near the rear daylight plane line.

technical_specifications.parameter: Max building height for structures with roof slope < 12:12
Max building height for structures with roof slope > 12:12
Max building height for structures on substandard or flag lots regardless of flood plane
Max building height for structures located in flood zones except on substandard and flag lots
Cumulative length of protrusions on any one side

additional_notes: Page number 28 at bottom left corner.
No handwritten notes, stamps, or markings detected.

qualifiers.text: There is no front daylight plane.
Rear protrusions subject to same rules as side protrusions

conditions.text: Max building height is 30' for structures w/ roof slope < 12:12
Max building height is 33' for structures w/ roof slope > 12:12
Max building height is 17' for structures on substandard or flag lots regardless of flood plane
Max building height variable for structures located in flood zones except on substandard and flag lots - up to 33'
Cumulative length of protrusions must not exceed 15' on any one side

logical_relationships.expression: Maximum protrusion length each 7.5' AND Minimum separation between protrusions 5' AND Cumulative length of protrusions must not exceed 15' on any one side

execution_sequence.action: Evaluate max building height based on roof slope and lot type
Check protrusion dimensions and cumulative length limits
